sent.orig: More deals are in the works elsewhere.
sent.trans: 更多的在其他地方的交易也在计划中。

sent.orig: As elsewhere, the share of labour in corporate profits has been falling.
sent.trans: 与其它地方一样，劳动力成本在企业利润中所占比重近年在不断下降。

sent.orig: This should improve profit margins in the output of traded goods, relative to margins elsewhere.
sent.trans: 相对于其它领域的利润率，美元疲弱将改善贸易型商品生产的利润率。

sent.orig: Such behavior says your mind is elsewhere.
sent.trans: 这样的举止会表明你在想其他的。

sent.orig: German white wine from the Moselle valley or a similar wine made elsewhere.
sent.trans: 德国的一种产自摩泽尔山谷的白酒或者其他地方制成的类似的白酒。
